arrangements 1.1.7

    • Benchmarking 'arrangements'

    Benchmarking ‘arrangements’

    benchmark.Rmd

    The goal of this document is to compare the performances of some of the existing packages for generating combinations, permutations and partitions.

    • gtools 3.8.1
    • combinat 0.0-8
    • multicool 0.1-10
    • partitions 1.9-19
    • permute 0.9-5
    • permutations 1.0-4
    • RcppAlgos 2.3.4
    library(microbenchmark)
library(gtools)
library(combinat)
library(multicool)
library(partitions)
library(permute)
library(permutations)
library(RcppAlgos)
library(arrangements)
gtools.permutations <- gtools::permutations
gtools.combinations <- gtools::combinations
utils.combn <- utils::combn

    gtools::permutations, gtools::combinations and utils::combn are renamed because they are being overwritten by arrangements::permutations, arrangements::combinations and combinat::combn respectively.

    Permutations

    Permutations of 6 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.permutations(6, 6),
    multicool = allPerm(initMC(1:6)),
    partitions = partitions::perms(6),
    permuate = allPerms(6),
    permutations = allperms(6),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(6, 6),
    arrangements = permutations(6),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr     min      lq    mean  median      uq     max neval
##        gtools  810.92  461.29  462.53  449.35  432.81  379.52   100
##     multicool  378.68  212.10  208.31  203.33  193.26  146.71   100
##    partitions    3.22    3.13    3.23    3.19    3.16    3.51   100
##      permuate 1441.01  834.12  804.95  803.85  720.04  592.78   100
##  permutations 4104.07 2417.71 2254.54 2274.36 1991.98 1779.49   100
##     RcppAlgos    2.64    2.72    2.89    2.88    2.66    7.05   100
##  arrangements    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00   100

    5-Permutations of 7 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.permutations(7, 5),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(7, 5),
    arrangements = permutations(7, 5),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr    min     lq   mean median     uq   max neval
##        gtools 336.37 222.53 175.81 178.35 152.91 87.60   100
##     RcppAlgos   1.54   1.79   1.59   1.62   1.57  1.18   100
##  arrangements   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00  1.00   100

    Permutations of multiset

    f <- c(2, 1, 2, 1, 2)
x <- rep(1:5, f)
microbenchmark(
    multicool = allPerm(initMC(x)),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(5, freqs = f),
    arrangements = permutations(freq = f),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr     min      lq    mean  median      uq    max neval
##     multicool 2650.40 1342.53 1245.25 1251.50 1152.26 958.17   100
##     RcppAlgos    1.59    1.32    1.39    1.38    1.41   1.78   100
##  arrangements    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00   1.00   100

    K-Permutations of multiset

    f <- c(2, 1, 2, 1, 2)
x <- rep(1:5, f)
microbenchmark(
    multicool = allPerm(initMC(x)),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(5, 6, freqs = f),
    arrangements = permutations(k = 6, freq = f),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr     min      lq    mean  median      uq     max neval
##     multicool 2567.58 2303.63 1966.14 2069.90 1866.04 1374.66   100
##     RcppAlgos    1.41    1.31    1.59    1.53    1.48    7.73   100
##  arrangements    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00   100

    Combinations

    7-Combinations of 15 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.combinations(15, 7),
    combinat = combn(15, 7),
    utils = utils.combn(15, 7),
    RcppAlgos = comboGeneral(15, 7),
    arrangements = combinations(15, 7),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr   min     lq   mean median     uq   max neval
##        gtools 410.4 375.57 295.72  354.1 215.34 637.0   100
##      combinat  93.8  83.54  67.60   81.6  53.50  89.4   100
##         utils 124.5 112.45  92.93  108.0  70.55 170.4   100
##     RcppAlgos   1.1   1.41   1.54    1.4   1.24  11.6   100
##  arrangements   1.0   1.00   1.00    1.0   1.00   1.0   100

    Combinations with replacement of 9 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.combinations(9, 6, repeats.allowed = TRUE),
    RcppAlgos = comboGeneral(9, 6, repetition = TRUE),
    arrangements = combinations(9, 6, replace = TRUE),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr    min     lq   mean median     uq   max neval
##        gtools 371.42 289.35 213.92 217.25 176.07 102.6   100
##     RcppAlgos   1.42   1.81   1.56   1.37   1.46   1.5   100
##  arrangements   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.0   100

    Combinations of multiset

    f <- c(2, 1, 2, 1, 2, 2, 1, 2)
x <- rep(1:8, f)
microbenchmark(
    RcppAlgos = comboGeneral(8, 6, freqs = f),
    arrangements = combinations(k = 6, freq = f),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr  min   lq mean median   uq  max neval
##     RcppAlgos 1.87 1.83 1.85   1.77 1.81 2.09   100
##  arrangements 1.00 1.00 1.00   1.00 1.00 1.00   100

    Partitions

    Partitions of 30

    microbenchmark(
    partitions = parts(30),
    arrangements = partitions(30),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr  min   lq mean median   uq   max neval
##    partitions 2.41 1.42 1.35   1.46 1.32 0.817   100
##  arrangements 1.00 1.00 1.00   1.00 1.00 1.000   100

    Partitions of 50 into 10 parts

    microbenchmark(
    partitions = restrictedparts(50, 10, include.zero = FALSE),
    arrangements = partitions(50, 10),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr  min   lq mean median   uq  max neval
##    partitions 3.07 2.77 2.67    2.8 2.65 1.43   100
##  arrangements 1.00 1.00 1.00    1.0 1.00 1.00   100
